values:
Alby Hub is doing more than meets the eye. Co-founder Moritz Kaminski joins to break down the latest features, how they're advancing the Lightning ecosystem, and making it all approachable for friends, family, and the next wave of users.

Show Notes:

  • Moritz on Nostr
  • Moritz Kaminski on X
  • Alby Hub - Your own Bitcoin Lightning node: easy, connectable, feature-rich ✨ Run anywhere. Become self-sovereign.
  • Release v1.18.5 Johan Helsingius · getAlby/hub
  • Alby Go
  • Alby Community Call
  • BOLT 12
  • Send Messages With Keysend

  • fountain-fm/podpay
